name: 10hrs in American Airlines FIRST CLASS (Not what you think…)
description:
Watch this video to see what it’s like to fly in American Airlines’ Flagship First Class from London to Dallas on a 777-300!

American Airlines is the only airline in the United States with true International First Class. They call it Flagship First, but is it more of a Flagship Flop? With a price as high as $15,000 for a seat, we couldn’t help but wonder: Is it worth it?  

Join us for a brutally honest review of this 10 hour flight across the Atlantic Ocean.

In this video, we’ll show you everything First Class from this experience. We’ll take you inside the American Airlines International First Class Lounge as well as show you some of the other places you can visit with an American Airlines Flagship First Class ticket. We'll also show you inside the Flagship First Lounge in DFW.

Once onboard, we’ll show you everything this First Class Seat has to offer, including its special “party trick!” Believe it or not, the First Class Seat swivels!

From there, we’ll show you the first class dining that’s available from American Airlines on this route as well as the drinks. We’ll explore the inflight entertainment and even discuss the service onboard.

Flagship First on an American Airlines 777-300er is a special experience and we feel so very fortunate to share it with you! As always, please never mistake any criticism for a lack of gratitude. We simply want to help you understand exactly what to expect if you choose to fly in Flagship First Class!

Once the flight’s done, we’ll rate everything in the First Class experience using the “JebScore.” We’ll also tell you exactly what we paid.

0:00 Introduction
1:55 American Airlines International First Lounge
3:05 Cathay Pacific First Class Lounge
5:37 Boarding
8:54 Flagship First Lunch
10:19 Flagship First Bed
11:53 Flagship First JebScore
13:40 Pricing
14:28 Bloopers

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel!
